fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to attack. You can choose to make the attack clean your victim up to one time.
- At night, you may Train, increasing your attack by one stage. After training 3 times your attack becomes overkill.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you gain a target. You don't know who they are.
- You're informed if another player kills your target.
- If your target dies, your goal is no longer to kill your target but to live to the end of the game.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill your target or live to the end of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
